mapper.select: select * from mp_job_grade g where g.id =(select job_grade_id from mp_job_level l WHERE l.id=#{id})
select id,POST_CODE AS postCode,POST_NAME AS postName from mp_post where group_id = #{groupId}
SELECT count(*) from mp_post where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_code = #{postCode}
SELECT count(*) from mp_post where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_name = #{postName}

with records as ( select TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR ,BIRTHDAY, now()) AS years,p.tenant_id from mp_post p, mp_userpost up , mp_staff s where p.id = up.POST_ID and s.user_id = up.USER_ID and up.USER_ID = s.user_id and s.STAFF_SCOPE = '1' and p.id = #{postId} ), ages as ( select sum( case when years < 20 then 1 else 0 end) as age1 , sum( case when years < 30 and years >= 20 then 1 else 0 end) as age2, sum( case when years < 40 and years >= 30 then 1 else 0 end) as age3, sum( case when years < 50 and years >= 40 then 1 else 0 end) as age4, sum( case when years < 65 and years >= 50 then 1 else 0 end) as age5, sum( case when years > 65 then 1 else 0 end) as age6,tenant_id from records ) select ifnull(age1,0) age1, ifnull(age2,0) age2, ifnull(age3,0) age3, ifnull(age4,0) age4, ifnull(age5,0) age5, ifnull(age6,0) age6, count(*) from ages

SELECT p.POST_NAME, p.POST_CODE, COALESCE(g1.GROUP_NAME, g2.GROUP_NAME ) GROUP_NAME, CONCAT(j1.JOB_LEVEL_NAME,'~',j2.JOB_LEVEL_NAME) JOB_LEVEL_NAME, s.SECTION_NAME, pp.PIPELINE_NAME, p.CREATED_TIME FROM mp_post p LEFT JOIN mp_section s ON p.SECTION_ID = s.ID LEFT JOIN mp_pipeline pp ON p.PIPELINE_ID = pp.ID left join mp_job_level j1 on p.JOB_LEVEL_ID1 = j1.ID left join mp_job_level j2 on p.JOB_LEVEL_ID2 = j2.ID LEFT JOIN mp_job_grade jg ON j1.JOB_grade_ID = jg.ID LEFT JOIN mp_group g1 ON p.GROUP_ID = g1.id LEFT JOIN mp_group g2 ON pp.GROUP_ID = g2.id where p.id = #{postId} order by p.id ${limit}

select p.POST_NAME, s.STAFF_NAME, s.STAFF_CODE, s.MOBILE, o.ORG_NAME from mp_post p inner join mp_userpost up on p.id= up.POST_ID inner join mp_staff s on s.user_id = up.USER_ID inner join mp_organization o on up.ORG_DEPT_ID = o.id where p.id = #{postId} order by p.id ${limit}
